title: Paper Chase:  Diana Fulbright’s “Akeldama Repudiation of Turin Shroud omits evidence from the Judean desert”
post: If you take a look at figure 7 of the Fulbright paper, you could have an inkling of what I really meant by the Turin Sindon stepped pyramid weave pattern I identified  with that of the Pray Ms iconographic sindon lying (almost) flat on the raised-up or displaced tomb-lid.
author: Max Patrick Hamon
